awards.title: Silver Medal in National Olympiad in Informatics (NOI) 2020

research.studyType: Intersection of Natural Language Processing and Music
courses: I collaborate with my classmate Zhuorui Ye on an interdisciplinary project “Musical Translation”, advised by Zhilin Yang and professional musical translator He Cheng. We proposed a method to translate lyrics in musicals from English to Chinese, satisfying both singability constraints such as length and rhyme, and translational constraints such as fluency and faithfulness to original lyrics.
Co-first authored paper was just submited to ACL 2024.

research.institution: Tsinghua University, Shanghai Qi Zhi Institute
courses: I worked on two projects about quadrupedal robots.

In the first project, we trained the quadrupedal robot to stand up and perform agile bipedal “dancing” motions such as ballet via Reinforcement Learning. The robot can track the human motions from a video, or follow commands given by LLM based on natural language instructions.
The second project is about expanding the capability of quadrupedal robots to perform complex locomotion and manipulation tasks.
